edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.ui

Class FullGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • edu.mbhs.madubozhi.touhou.ui.FullGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class FullGame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Main class that is run at the start. It is an extension of the JFrame swing Component, and combines the game, novel, and user interfaces.
    Author:
    bowenzhi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
